trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> objects.
This class provides a collection that can contain <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> class.
This is a default empty collection constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> class using the specified array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> objects.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> array that indicates the verbs to contain within the collection.
value is `null`.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index in the collection at which the verb was added.
Adds the specified set of designer verbs to the collection.
An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
value is `null`.
Adds the specified collection of designer verbs to the collection.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> to add to the collection.
value is `null`.
Gets a value indicating whether the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> exists in the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to search for in the collection.
`true` if the specified object exists in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the collection members to the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> array beginning at the specified destination index.
The array to copy collection members to.
The destination index to begin copying to.
Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> whose index to get in the collection.
The index of the specified object if it is found in the list; otherwise, -1.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> at the specified index.
The index in the collection at which to insert the verb.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to insert in the collection.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> at the specified index.
The index at which to get or set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> at each valid index in the collection.
Raises the `Clear` event.
Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Clear` event.
Raises the `Insert` event.
Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Insert` event.
The index at which to insert an item.
The object to insert.
Raises the `Remove` event.
Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Remove` event.
The index at which to remove the item.
The object to remove.
Raises the `Set` event.
Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Set` event.
The index at which to set the item.
The old object.
The new object.
Raises the `Validate` event.
Inheritors can override this method to add behavior for the `Validate` event.
The object to validate.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref> to remove from the collection.
